tool_description: Generates speech with specific accent characteristics and regional pronunciation patterns for various English and international accents.

input_text.description: Text to be synthesized with accent

accent_type.description: Accent: american, british, australian, irish, scottish, canadian, indian, southern_us

error_messages: Unsupported accent type: Use american, british, australian, irish, scottish, canadian, indian, or southern_us.
Invalid accent strength: Use values between 0.1 and 1.0.
Invalid base voice: Base voice model not found or incompatible with accent.
Pronunciation conflict: Specified adaptations conflict with selected accent type.
Text processing error: Input text contains unsupported characters or formatting.
usage: Provide text, accent type, strength level, and base voice. Optionally specify pronunciation adaptations for customized accent generation.
